nodes.bodyText: @wslany since we updated version to ....96 for the last three stitch bricks, is this correct to increase by one here again?

Yes, increasing it here again is fine. It is better to increase it without harm done than to forget. By increasing each time the xml changes, we don't have to think and check anymore whether it happened already, i.e., we follow the isolation principle. Could also be important if some things need to be retracted later.
